translation.en: Will you excuse me one second?

translation.zh: 水面浮油 水下沉油

translation.en: A pregnancy is brutal on your body.
translation.zh: 怀孕是对身体的巨大考验

translation.en: There's also a risk from the hormonal changes:
translation.zh: 有引起荷尔蒙变化的风险

translation.en: Are you sure you still wanna be a surrogate?
If more than two embryos take, the couple may choose to abort some.
translation.zh: 假如超过两个胚胎着床那对夫妇可选择部分流产

translation.en: Now, he's gonna keep pushing her here. It's deliberate.
translation.zh: 他会一直故意给她施加压力

translation.en: The girls always think they've made their decision to be a surrogate...
translation.zh: 女孩们总以为已经做好代孕的决定

translation.en: ...but a lot of them change their mind after about an hour with Carl.
translation.zh: 但许多人和卡尔谈一小时后就变卦了
可能吧 叫安娜沃什

translation.en: She's 21. She lives here in the city, she's a waitress.
And she is brand-new. Just walked in today.
translation.zh: 她是新人 今天才来

translation.en: -What would your choice be? -If the children were mine?
translation.zh: -你会怎么选？-假如是我的孩子？
难道不是吗？在某种意义上

translation.en: Life can take an unexpected turn.
If life worked out the way it was supposed to, I wouldn't be here.
translation.zh: 假如万事如意 我今天也不会在这里了

translation.en: Anna, why are you really doing this?
translation.zh: 安娜 你做这一行的真正目的是什么？

translation.en: Because I have the opportunity to help someone who can't have a child.
translation.zh: 因为这样我就有机会帮助不能生育的人

translation.en: I don't like your interview guy. He is a bully.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢你们的面试官 他太蛮狠

translation.en: Oh, they're gonna wish they did.
I want you to bring Todd up to speed.
If we go to court on this, it'll be the firm sticking its neck out.
translation.zh: 假如对簿公堂 冒险的是公司

translation.en: Now, this is still your baby, but I want a second pair of eyes.
translation.zh: 这事还归你管但我想多安排一个人盯着

translation.en: He's putting Todd frigging Decker on my case.
translation.zh: 他们要让托德戴克插手我的案子

translation.en: It took forever to fill out the paperwork, and I was starved...
translation.zh: 有填不完的表格 我肚子饿了

translation.en: ...so I dropped into that little diner where she works and she was here...
translation.zh: 于是就去了她工作的餐厅她正好在

translation.en: ...waiting for her fiancé to pick her up.
I know, I know, I know.
There are a million things that can go wrong...
translation.zh: 还有很多东西可能会有问题

translation.en: ...and we still have to do the health checks and just everything.
translation.zh: 我们还要健康检查什么的

translation.en: I just don't want us to spend another two years looking...
...and maybe missing, and the whole time, she was the one.
translation.zh: 然后错过 而与此同时她是最适合的人选

translation.en: But there's something else there, like...
...I know she can take care of herself.
translation.zh: 我知道她能照顾好自己

translation.en: I invited her and her fiancé Michael over for dinner tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 我请她和未婚夫麦可明晚来家里吃饭

translation.en: Well, I'll tell you, when you move, you move.
translation.zh: 我觉得你总是自作主张

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I just wanna do it right.
translation.zh: 对不起 但我想把事情办好

translation.en: I really want them to like us.
translation.zh: 我真的希望他们喜欢我们

translation.en: I'm sorry if I overdid this. We could've just gone out.
translation.zh: 不好意思我可能搞得太郑重了本来可以出去吃的

translation.en: It's what I do, actually. I'm a chef.
translation.zh: 其实这是我的本行 我是厨师

translation.en: I know it's just a meal...
...but I meant it to show you both how committed we are.
translation.zh: 但我想让两位看到我们的诚意

translation.en: -One hundred percent. -But you will be carrying it.
translation.zh: -完全如此-但怀孩子的人是你们

translation.en: In the service, I know a lot of guys who've done this before.
translation.zh: 身为军人 我认识很多这样做的人

translation.en: When you're deployed, it just makes sense.
translation.zh: 被派驻海外后 这是合理的选择

translation.en: When I'm gone, you two, you know, you come see her whenever you want.
translation.zh: 我走后 你们俩有空就多去看她

translation.en: I understand you'll be using the money to buy a business.
translation.zh: 听说你打算用这笔钱买一家公司

translation.en: Oh, from my uncle. Residential and commercial roofing.
translation.zh: 是的 从我叔叔手上民用及商用屋顶修缮

translation.en: He had quite the run here after Katrina.
translation.zh: 飓风过后他生意好得不行

translation.en: Owning the company means you get a piece of everybody's take-home.
translation.zh: 拥有公司意味着我可以分到所有人工资的一部分
加上利润 日常开支

translation.en: Mike's always been real smart about money.
translation.zh: 麦可一直很有生意头脑

translation.en: ...we'll be able to put together almost $40,000.
translation.zh: 我们可以凑足四万美元

translation.en: And that's enough to buy the whole thing.
Anna, I'm sure there are probably some questions that you have for us?
translation.zh: 安娜 你应该有些事想问我们吧？

translation.en: These renovations must have cost you a pretty penny.
Well, the house was part of Laura's inheritance from her grandmother.
translation.zh: 这房子是劳拉祖母的遗产

translation.en: Must be nice to lay out that kind of cash.
Working by windows, you see a lot of things that nobody else would see.
translation.zh: 在窗边工作会看到许多别人看不到的事

translation.en: That, there, isn't the right material.
That gutter's leaking at the splice.

translation.zh: 听着 如果要这么做

translation.en: ...we just wanna make sure that you and Anna are comfortable with it.
translation.zh: 我们得确保你和安娜都同意

translation.en: See, it's just that we're down to our last viable embryo, right?
translation.zh: 我们只剩最后一个可用胚胎了

translation.en: And we wanna make sure that you know how serious our intentions are.
translation.zh: 我们想确保你们了解我们的决心

translation.en: We tried for a long time to get pregnant.
It really put the two of us through hell.
translation.zh: 这事让我们两人备受煎熬

translation.en: I've never been able to give anybody anything.
translation.zh: 我也从未能给予任何人什么

translation.en: Okay, just spill it, Taylor, you didn't like them.
translation.zh: 直说了吧 泰勒 你不喜欢他们

translation.en: Okay, him. I mean, we go outside, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 我是不喜欢他我们去外面聊天

translation.en: And he's talking to me about...

translation.zh: 透过窗口看家庭主妇脱衣服

translation.en: Maybe that's his way of bonding.
translation.zh: 也许他是想和你套近乎

translation.en: I don't know, babe. I mean, we can keep looking.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我们可以继续找

translation.en: I think doing something like this is really important to her.
translation.zh: 我认为这件事对她很重要

translation.en: Yeah, I know, it's kind of cute. I mean, you see...
translation.zh: 是 我懂 她挺可爱的

translation.en: ...the way she left a price tag on the dress?
She wanted to wear something nice to impress us.
translation.zh: 她想打扮端庄给我们留下好印象

translation.en: I did that on our first date.
translation.zh: 我第一次和你约会时也这么做

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I remember that dress.
translation.zh: 对 我记得那条裙子

translation.en: Matter of fact, I remember undoing it, like this.
translation.zh: 其实 我是记得怎么脱 这样

translation.en: You were so bad that you were, oh, so good.
translation.zh: 你是很坏 但其实你很好

translation.en: We're gonna do this, aren't we?
translation.zh: 事情就这么定了 是不是？

translation.en: It's gonna feel like a little stick.
I'm placing the embryo. Don't move.
translation.zh: 我在植入胚胎 别动

translation.en: All right, we're done. You did great.
translation.zh: 好了 大功告成 你表现很棒

translation.en: People always talk about how they know the moment...
A wedding night or a special date.
translation.zh: 新婚之夜或一次特别的约会

translation.en: But I will know for sure...
The baby could be starting its life right now.
translation.zh: 宝宝可能已经开始生长了

translation.en: It just keeps hitting me how strange it is.
I mean, it's against the law to pay someone to have sex...
translation.zh: 付钱和人上床是犯法的

translation.en: ...but you can pay a woman to get pregnant with your child?
translation.zh: 但你却可以付钱让女人帮你生孩子？

translation.en: -Imagine how it is for the boyfriend. -She said she loves him.
translation.zh: -想想她男友的感受-她说过她爱他

translation.en: She doesn't hesitate, doesn't question it...
translation.zh: 她毫不犹豫 毫不置疑

translation.en: She asked if it was the same with us.
translation.zh: 她问我们是否也一样相爱
但其实没那么简单 对吗？

translation.en: When I was working on this room...
...close my eyes and imagine you in here, playing with our baby.
translation.zh: 闭上眼想象你在这里和我们的孩子玩耍
我们就要组成一个家了

translation.en: We need to do more research on that section of pollution, 11.62.
translation.zh: 我们要对那片污染区域做更多调查11点62

translation.en: Once we have that going on....
-You guys go ahead. I gotta take this. -All right, John.
translation.zh: -你们先走 我得接个电话-好的 约翰

translation.en: -Hey, babe. Just got out of court. -John.
translation.zh: -宝贝 我刚离开法庭-约翰

translation.en: John, you're gonna be a father.
translation.zh: 约翰 你要当爸爸了

translation.en: She took a home test. She took three of them...
...and all three of them were positive.
Oh, my God. I'm gonna be a father.
translation.zh: 天啊 我要当爸爸了

translation.en: Anna's sitting here watching me bawl my eyes out.
translation.zh: 安娜就坐在这看着我喜极而泣

translation.en: -I want her to go to Yale. -No, no. He is gonna go to LSU.
translation.zh: -我想让女儿上耶鲁-不 儿子上路易斯安那州立大学

translation.en: Anna's in the shower. She's gonna come say hi when she's done.
translation.zh: 安娜在洗澡 洗完就出来打招呼

translation.en: -Okay. You guys going to yoga together? -Yep.
I didn't know how I'd feel about somebody else's body going through everything...
translation.zh: 我不知道对别人的身体经历一系列变化有何感觉
但我真的很喜欢这姑娘

translation.en: -I really like you. -I really love you.
translation.zh: -我真的很喜欢你-我真的很爱你

translation.en: I didn't know he was here.
-He came home early. -No, Anna, this is-- Oh, it's--
translation.zh: -他提早回家了-安娜 这真是…

translation.en: If this is right, they got nowhere to run.
translation.zh: 如果材料准确 那他们无处可逃了

translation.en: Well, unless they draw Judge Steve Paulson.
translation.zh: 除非他们请出史蒂夫保森法官

translation.en: He doesn't believe in corporate negligence.
translation.zh: 他不相信企业疏忽过失之说

translation.en: Invite him to your charity event next month.
translation.zh: 请他出席下个月的慈善活动

translation.en: The man loves cocktail shrimp and the Saints.
translation.zh: 他喜欢鸡尾酒大虾和圣徒乐队

translation.en: Will you guys just excuse me for a minute?
She told me to come. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 是她让我来的 对不起

translation.en: I had a doctor's appointment. Mike didn't pick me up.
translation.zh: 我约了医生 麦可没来接我

translation.en: -Come on, honey. -I grew up in a neighborhood like this.
translation.zh: -快点 乖-我儿时就住在这样的地方

translation.en: My father, he worked so hard, he didn't have that many days off...
translation.zh: 我父亲工作很忙 没多少时间

translation.en: ...he used to pick me up from school.
God, I can't wait to do that.
translation.zh: 天啊 我等不及要当爸爸了

translation.en: -So you okay? -Yeah. Thanks for the ride.
translation.zh: -你没事吗？-没事 谢谢你送我

translation.en: Guess you forgot to pick her up.
Anything you need me to talk to her about?
translation.zh: 有什么需要我跟她谈谈吗？

translation.en: Go in the house right now.
It's been a long day, cat.
What's troubling that pretty little head of yours?
translation.zh: 你的小脑瓜里在想什么？

translation.en: Anna said she'd call me, and she hasn't.
translation.zh: 安娜说她会给我电话 但没打

translation.en: She's young. She probably just forgot.
translation.zh: 她还年轻 可能是忘了
-宝宝没事吧？-没事 我确定

translation.en: The perpetrator, Mr. Mitchell, he'll be taken in...
translation.zh: 行凶者米切尔先生会被拘留

translation.en: ...and charged with domestic battery. He acknowledged striking Miss Walsh.
translation.zh: 被控实施家暴他承认打了沃什小姐

translation.en: -You're not gonna let him out, are you? -He makes bail, we can't hold him.
translation.zh: -你们不会放他出来吧？-他交了保释金 我们只能放人

translation.en: -But he'll hurt me. -He tries to harm you...
...you call us, we'll arrest him again.
translation.zh: 你就报警 我们会再抓他

translation.en: You may wanna try to find another place to stay.
I don't have another place to stay.
I got him. All right. Get him in the car.
translation.zh: 我抓到他了 好的 带他上车

translation.en: -Come on. Come on! Get in the car! -Anna.
You're okay, all right? We're gonna take care of you.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？我们会照顾你的

translation.en: You're gonna be fine. Let's get you inside.
translation.zh: 你不会有事 快进屋来

translation.en: I need you to listen to me, Mike.
I need you to really understand what I'm about to say.
translation.zh: 你仔细听懂我要说的话

translation.en: This is a case for domestic abuse...
This is a letter to the DA...
...recommending no less than seven criminal counts.
translation.zh: 建议指控你不下七项罪名

translation.en: So, what's gonna happen now is this:
You're gonna stay away from Anna.
We're never gonna see you again. She's never gonna see you again.
translation.zh: 我们再也不想见到你她也再不想见到你

translation.en: In 10 days, you're gonna be shipped off to the Middle East.
translation.zh: 十天后 你就要出发去中东

translation.en: And when you return, your money's gonna be waiting for you.
translation.zh: 回国时 你的钱会等着你

translation.en: Then I'm gonna make sure your punk ass is sent somewhere...
translation.zh: 然后确保你被送进某个监狱

translation.en: ...that's gonna make the Middle East look like Club Med.
translation.zh: 和那里相比 中东就是儿童乐园

translation.en: She's sleeping in the guest house.
...make sure Mike wouldn't be a problem anymore.
John, it's okay. You can admit it. She's beautiful.
translation.zh: 约翰 没事的你可以承认 她是很美

translation.en: I guess if you're the type of guy...
An ass that you can bounce a quarter off of.
translation.zh: 弹力十足的翘臀的男人

translation.en: But I hadn't really noticed, I have to tell you.
translation.zh: 但我真没注意到 我必须告诉你

translation.en: Oh, sometimes I forget how good of a liar you are.
translation.zh: 有时我忘了你说谎技巧有多高明

translation.en: Anna, we'd like you to stay here with us in our guest house.
translation.zh: 安娜 我们希望你能在客房住下

translation.en: We'd like you to take time off of work. We'll pay you whatever you were making.
translation.zh: 不用去上班了 工资算我们的

translation.en: ...so you don't feel trapped. Come and go as you please.
translation.zh: 这样你就不会觉得拘束 想出去就出去

translation.en: We talked about it. We feel more comfortable...
translation.zh: 我们谈过了 知道你大部分…

translation.en: -...knowing you're here most of the time. -And knowing that you're safe.
translation.zh: -时候在这我们更放心-并且知道你安全

translation.en: And he's not gonna be around anymore.
Not for a very long time.
Now, you are doing this incredible thing for us.
translation.zh: 你在为我们做这么了不起的事

translation.en: It's the least we can do.
Let us do something nice for you, okay?
Well, she is now officially better than me in yoga.
translation.zh: 她现在瑜伽比我还厉害

translation.en: Well, she's 10 weeks pregnant. Give it another five weeks...
translation.zh: 她怀孕十周了 再过五周

translation.en: ...you'll be able to take her down.
Because yoga's all about who wins, right?
translation.zh: 因为瑜伽就看重胜负 对吧？

translation.en: She says it's got her body going crazy.
translation.zh: 她说怀孕让她的身体发疯了
渴望性爱 渴望男人

translation.en: He just shipped out without even contacting her.

translation.zh: -同僚晚宴准备好了吗？-一切就绪

translation.en: Laura, sweetie, come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 劳拉 亲爱的 出发了

translation.en: You look like a movie star.
Listen, you have both of our cell numbers.
translation.zh: 听着 我们俩的手机你都有

translation.en: And we'll be home by midnight.
It's amazing the way he is with you.
And you have a good night.
-You too. Have fun. -All right. We will.
translation.zh: -你们也是 玩得开心-好 我们会的

translation.en: I am in control of my life.
I will experience the joy of pure love."
I fall asleep there all the time.
I'd like a cup of coffee.
Doctor says I'm allowed one cup a day.
translation.zh: 医生说一天可以喝一杯
-天啊 这猫好老-郝维辛小姐
它岂止老 简直是古董

translation.en: I was never really a cat person, but Laura loves her.
translation.zh: 我其实不是爱猫人士 但劳拉喜欢

translation.en: All these years, she treated that cat just like she was her baby.
translation.zh: 这些年来她一直把这猫当成自己的孩子

translation.en: But when the real baby comes...
translation.zh: 不过等真正的宝宝降临时

translation.en: ...we'll have to see how old Miss Havisham reacts then, huh?
translation.zh: 我们要看老郝维辛小姐作何反应了

translation.en: I told Laura she's lucky to have you.
translation.zh: 我昨天告诉劳拉她能有你很幸运

translation.en: A husband who really loves his wife.
translation.zh: 一个真爱自己妻子的丈夫

translation.en: Well, I like to think that I'm the lucky one.
translation.zh: 我觉得幸运的是我才对

translation.en: I knew you would say something like that.
I'll show you what it feels like.
He isn't even an inch long yet.
But you can feel where my tummy's starting to change.
translation.zh: 但已经可以感到我肚子的变化

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Yeah, I can feel it.
Can I admit something to you?
It's a little weird that I'm pregnant with your baby.
translation.zh: 怀着你的孩子感觉怪怪的

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, that is strange, isn't it?
translation.zh: 是有点奇怪 不是吗？

translation.en: Because without you, we couldn't do any of this.
translation.zh: 因为没有你 这一切都不可能

translation.en: Hey, listen, next week we're having our annual charity event...
translation.zh: 听着 下周是一年一度的慈善活动

translation.en: ...here at the house. You should join us.
translation.zh: 在家里举办 你可以一起

translation.en: -What's it for? -We like to raise money...
...for the Boys and Girls Club of America.
You're amazing. Yes, I will come.
translation.zh: 你真了不起 行 我一定来

translation.en: I'm so glad you miss me.
I mean, living up there in that beautiful big house, that must be nice.
translation.zh: 住在那么美的大房子里感觉一定很棒

translation.en: Did you know that you have their only embryo?
translation.zh: 你知道你怀着他们唯一的胚胎吗？

translation.en: -It's a baby now. -And they don't have any more.
translation.zh: -现在是宝宝了-他们已经没有了

translation.en: And in the eyes of the law...
...since it's inside of you, it belongs to us.
translation.zh: 你体内的东西就属于我们

translation.en: We can decide to keep it for ourselves anytime we want.
translation.zh: 我们随时可以决定自己留下

translation.en: So here's what you're gonna do.
Every single month, you're gonna say...
translation.zh: 每过一个月 你就说

translation.en: ...that you're changing your mind, and you're keeping it.
translation.zh: 你改变主意了 想留下孩子
也许四千 也许更多

translation.en: They've been really good to me.
John really wants to be a father.
What do you think is gonna happen, Anna?
translation.zh: 你以为会发生什么 安娜？

translation.en: You'll live happily ever after with him in that big house?
translation.zh: 你会和他在那大房子里幸福地生活一辈子？

translation.en: You are like a cow to him.
translation.zh: 对他而言你就是头母牛

translation.en: I'll do it. I'll do it, Mike. I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我答应 麦可 我答应

translation.en: I'll do it. I'll tell them.
translation.zh: 我答应 我会跟他们说

translation.en: I'll do it for you, baby.
It's from the firm. And tell Laura she absolutely tops herself...
translation.zh: 这是事务所的心意转告劳拉每次你们办晚宴

translation.en: -...every time you guys do this. -I'll do that. Thanks.
translation.zh: -她都超越了自己-我会的 谢谢

translation.en: Nobody knows this yet, but Grafton Industries...
translation.zh: 还没人知道这事但格拉夫顿工业集团…
已经私下提出了和解条件

translation.en: -You're not gonna settle with them? -You kidding me?
All this time, you've been telling me we had them by the balls.
translation.zh: 从一开始你就说我们吃定他们了

translation.en: This is gonna lock up partner for you, John.
translation.zh: 此事一成你当定合伙人了 约翰

translation.en: Look, I was talking to Anna earlier.
I didn't realize she was your second cousin, man.

translation.zh: 根据我的计算 她比…
合法年龄大三岁 对吗？

translation.en: I'm just checking with you. You wouldn't mind if I asked her out, would you?
translation.zh: 我只是跟你确认一下你不介意我追她吧？

translation.en: No. You can ask her out.
Normally, this is the part of the evening...
translation.zh: 通常 在晚宴的这个环节

translation.en: ...where John asks all of you to reach for your checkbooks.
translation.zh: 约翰都会要求各位开支票

translation.en: And I'm sure he'll manage to get that in still...
translation.zh: 今年他肯定也一样会得逞

translation.en: ...but first, I wanted everyone to know...
translation.zh: 但首先 我希望各位知道

translation.en: ...how important the Boys and Girls Clubs of America is to us.
translation.zh: 美国儿童俱乐部对我们有多重要

translation.en: John loves children, and they love him.
translation.zh: 约翰爱孩子 孩子们也爱他

translation.en: I'd also like to thank all of you here...
Now you can all take out your checkbooks.
translation.zh: 现在可以把支票拿出来了

translation.en: Is that the dress you gave her?
You want me to go talk to her?
That's not the dress I gave you.
It's just, the one that you gave me didn't really fit.
I was gonna ask you, but you were so busy with the party.
translation.zh: 我本来要问你 但你忙着张罗晚宴

translation.en: I can-- I can go change...
Thank you for staying late. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们留这么晚 我十分感激

translation.en: Well, no one fell in the pool.
I found it in your record collection.
translation.zh: 我在你唱片收藏里找到的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, she crashed about an hour ago.
Has to catch a flight at 6 in the morning for work.
translation.zh: 明天早上六点的飞机出差

translation.en: So how'd our little story hold up?
translation.zh: 我们的小家伙怎么样了？

translation.en: I was acting out a part.
I had a secret in me that no one knew.
translation.zh: 我有个不为人知的秘密

translation.en: It made me think that I made a good choice for the baby.
translation.zh: 让我觉得我为孩子选对人了

translation.en: Well, I thought that we were the ones that made the choice.
You're gonna make a great dad.
Well, I'm glad it was you.
I am gonna take a bath before bed.

translation.zh: 谢谢你做的一切 约翰

translation.en: Something's knocking against the guest house.
The guy in the gray suit? You know, he was staring at me all night.
translation.zh: 穿灰色西装那个？他盯着我看了一整晚

translation.en: Had to be uncomfortable for you.
Can't blame a person for staring.
It just means they like what they see.

translation.zh: 其实 我喜欢成熟一点的男人

translation.en: Mike was the youngest guy I ever dated.
translation.zh: 麦可是和我好过的人里最年轻的

translation.en: -Is that your phone? -They'll leave a message.
translation.zh: -是你手机响吗？-他们会留言的

translation.en: So I have to go into the office today.
I got an important deposition. You can order out.
translation.zh: 有一场重要的出庭你可以叫外卖

translation.en: I'm not gonna be back until late.
How about we go out to the lake house?
Just you and I, a weekend before the baby comes.
translation.zh: 就你和我趁孩子出生前去度个周末

translation.en: As soon as you get back from Houston.
translation.zh: 等你从休斯敦回来就去

translation.en: John, you're not gonna like this...
translation.zh: 约翰 你可能不会高兴

translation.en: ...but Chef Folse wants me out here tomorrow as well.
translation.zh: 但弗尔斯大厨要我再多留一天

translation.en: -You're right. I don't like it. -Should I say no?
translation.zh: -没错 我是不高兴-那我拒绝？

translation.en: Should I just come home now?
No, go ahead and stay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 不用 你留下吧 没事

translation.en: Chef Folse is offering me a major promotion.
translation.zh: 弗尔斯大厨准备给我升职

translation.en: That's the reason he brought me down, so he could offer me...
translation.zh: 他带我来就为了这事 让我…

translation.en: But I thought we talked about, you know--
We have six months before the baby's born.
translation.zh: 宝宝出生前我们有六个月时间

translation.en: I told him I could run the company while we look for a permanent replacement.
translation.zh: 我答应暂时管理公司直到他们找到永久的替代者

translation.en: Why not just turn it down, sweetheart?
translation.zh: 为何不直接拒绝 亲爱的？

translation.en: I think I should take it...
...even if it is only for six months. But that's assuming you agree.
translation.zh: 哪怕只有六个月 前提是你同意

translation.en: I mean, I'd have to spend a few days a month up here.
translation.zh: （妈咪362消息老爸你好！点击播放视频） 我每个月得来这边几天

translation.en: But that wouldn't be until later in the year.
And you could come up for some weekends.
translation.zh: 有些周末你也可以过来

translation.en: Babe, are you happy for me?
translation.zh: 宝贝 你为我高兴吗？

translation.en: -I really wanna do this. -Yeah, no, sweetheart. Definitely.
translation.zh: -我真的很想要这份工作-当然 亲爱的 完全可以

translation.en: I'm-- I'm definitely happy for you.
And you like spending time with Anna, right?
translation.zh: 你也愿意陪着安娜 对吗？

translation.en: She might even have a little thing for you.
translation.zh: 她或许还有点喜欢你呢

translation.en: I mean, you're a big boy, you can handle a little attention.
translation.zh: 你是个大人 不至于乱了方寸

translation.en: No, congratulations, sweetheart. I am so proud of you.
translation.zh: 没事 祝贺你 亲爱的我为你骄傲

translation.en: This is me and Laura. She is my wife, okay?
translation.zh: 这是我和劳拉她是我妻子 好吗？

translation.en: This is our home. Do you not understand that?
translation.zh: 这是我们的家 你明白吗？

translation.en: I don't wanna have to say anything to her.
No, wait, hold on. No, no. Please, please.
translation.zh: 不 等一下 别走 求你

translation.en: Maybe-- Maybe I said something to encourage you in all this.
translation.zh: 也许我说过一些话误导了你

translation.en: And if I did do that, then I am sorry.
translation.zh: 如果是这样 我很抱歉

translation.en: Didn't wanna wait until tomorrow, so I grabbed the next flight.
translation.zh: 我不想等到明天就赶最近一班飞机来了

translation.en: Good. That's-- That's good. Congratulations on everything.
translation.zh: 好的 太棒了 祝贺你

translation.en: Laura just got a promotion at her company.
Well, it's only until the baby comes.
It's good to have you back.
Anybody wanna make me a goddamn quiche?
You're drunk. Okay? I was gonna call you.
translation.zh: 你醉了 我正要打电话给你

translation.en: Before they find out this whole thing's a scam...
translation.zh: 在他们发现这是个骗局之前

translation.en: ...you're gonna tell them that you changed your mind.
translation.zh: 你要告诉他们你改变主意了

translation.en: -You'll get them to give you money. -No.
And you and I are heading to Arizona...
translation.zh: 然后和我去亚利桑那州

translation.en: ...and I'm gonna tell Laura and John...
...you wanted to take their last baby from them.
translation.zh: 你想带走他们最后的孩子

translation.en: Leave a message and I'll call you right back.
translation.zh: 请留言 我会给你回电

translation.en: It's so goddamn typical of you.
Some asshole buys you some fancy shit...
translation.zh: 哪个混蛋给你买件好衣服

translation.en: ...and you fall head over heels for him.
translation.zh: 你就被他迷得神魂颠倒
有头脑的人是你 麦可

translation.en: Hi, this is Laura Taylor. Leave a message, and I'll--
translation.zh: 我是劳拉泰勒 请留言 我会…

translation.en: I can't hold the room. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 那个病房留不了 抱歉

translation.en: You know what, let's just go ahead and....

translation.zh: 亲爱的 不 等等

translation.en: ...just get down here as soon as you can.
I'm sorry. I had it in my schedule as 2:00.
translation.zh: 对不起 我时间表上写的是两点

translation.en: -Maybe you just entered it wrong. -No, I didn't enter it wrong. I--
translation.zh: -也许是你打错了-我没有打错 我…

translation.en: Damn it. I know I didn't. I-- I--
translation.zh: 该死 我肯定没打错

translation.en: Someone changed it in my phone! I know that I put it in right.
translation.zh: 有人动了我的手机我输入的是正确时间

translation.en: I booked my flights around it! I know that I did! Damn it!
translation.zh: 我还根据时间订了机票千真万确 该死
-我…-劳拉 别说了 拜托

translation.en: This is the only time we're ever gonna be able to do this.
It's all right. Just don't worry about it.
Let's just go somewhere. I don't know, lunch.
translation.zh: 我们去找个地方吃午餐

translation.en: I left a client at the airport.
translation.zh: 我把一个客户留在机场

translation.en: I knew it. Let's have lunch today. To celebrate.
translation.zh: 我就知道是中午一起吃饭庆祝

translation.en: Just you and me. I promise it'll be fun.
translation.zh: 就你和我 肯定会很开心
-安娜 出什么事了吗？-为什么？

translation.en: Because you shouldn't be calling me at work.
translation.zh: 因为你不该打我的工作电话

translation.en: Okay? I cannot sneak away, I will not have lunch with you.
translation.zh: 我不能擅自离开 没空和你吃饭

translation.en: I have appointments all afternoon. Like I said earlier--
translation.zh: 我整个下午都有预约之前跟你说过…
泰勒先生办公室 请稍等

translation.en: -Anna Walsh. -Tell her I left for the day.
-What is it? -Why are you lying to me?
I'd never lie to you, John.
translation.zh: 我从没骗过你 约翰

translation.en: I've always told you the truth.
All right. No, we're not gonna do this.
translation.zh: 好了 我们不能这样

translation.en: Nope. We're not doing anything fun.
translation.zh: 不行 没什么好玩的

translation.en: What a surprise. Laura's working late again!
translation.zh: 真是没想到 劳拉又加班

translation.en: Why did you think she would make a good mother?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得她会是个好母亲？

translation.en: I wonder if she actually even wanted to.
translation.zh: 我好奇她是不是真的想要孩子

translation.en: Are you sure she had miscarriages?
Because you know there are ways to fake that, right?
translation.zh: 因为作假的手段可多了

translation.en: -Are you out of your mind? -You need to be nicer to me, John.
translation.zh: -你疯了吗？-你得对我好一点 约翰

translation.en: I will leave. The law says I can.
translation.zh: 不然我就走 法律允许的

translation.en: This is my baby. Mike says we can sell it.
translation.zh: 这是我的宝宝麦可说我们可以卖掉

translation.en: Leave. Go. Get out of the house!
-You don't mean that. -Oh, yes, I do.
I'll tell Laura everything. It will kill her. It will break her heart.
translation.zh: 我会告诉劳拉一切她会很难受 很伤心

translation.en: But you know what? We'll survive it.
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？我们能挺过去

translation.en: We'll pick up the pieces and move on because that's what we do.
translation.zh: 我们会振作起来然后继续生活因为这就是我们的本事

translation.en: But what about you? You'll be alone.
You'll be broke, with a kid that's not even really yours.
translation.zh: 你会身无分文带着一个根本不属于你的孩子
-我是怀特-罗兰 我是约翰

translation.en: Hey, what's up? What, the old man needs another rock looked under?
translation.zh: 怎么了？老头子又让你掘地三尺？

translation.en: No, actually, I need a favor. And it's not business.
translation.zh: 不 其实是我找你帮忙 不是公事

translation.en: There's a guy I'd like you to look into. His name is Mike Mitchell.
translation.zh: 我要你帮我查个人 叫麦可米切尔
海军的 驻扎在路易斯安那州

translation.en: He's been deployed about two months. Just need a history on him.
translation.zh: 大约两个月前他被派往海外我需要他的履历

translation.en: Anything you can find would be great.
translation.zh: 能查到的任何资料我都要

translation.en: I'm on it. Anything for you, John.
translation.zh: 交给我吧 在所不辞 约翰

translation.en: Look, you know the firm monitors computer use...
translation.zh: 你知道 事务所监控员工的电脑

translation.en: The system's set up to automatically snag...
...certain types of files, things that could...
translation.zh: 特定类型的文件 那些有损…

translation.en: Todd recognized her from your party.
translation.zh: 托德说在派对上见过她

translation.en: She's not your relative, is she?
translation.zh: 她不是你的亲戚 对吧？
不 是为我们代孕的

translation.en: And I don't see how this is company business.
translation.zh: 我不认为这与公司有关

translation.en: Anna has been getting prenatal care from a clinic...
translation.zh: 安娜接受产前治疗的诊所…

translation.en: ...that happens to be a subsidiary of Grafton Industries.
translation.zh: 恰巧是格拉夫顿工业集团的下属企业

translation.en: She is a patient of the very people...

translation.zh: 这事非同小可 约翰

translation.en: I'm giving the case to Todd.
translation.zh: 我把这件案子交给托德

translation.en: I'm sorry, John. That video got bounced straight to the old man.
translation.zh: 对不起 约翰那视频直接被转发给老板了

translation.en: I think I just lost my job.
You ready for things to get worse?
Remember that guy you asked me to run a check on? Mitchell?
translation.zh: 记得你让我查的那人吗？米切尔

translation.en: ...he was discharged from the military for some assaults.
translation.zh: 他因故意伤人被军队开除

translation.en: But after I saw the video, I got to thinking about that girl.
translation.zh: 但在我看过视频后我开始想女孩的问题

translation.en: Well, her real name isn't Walsh.
She got married at 19 in Little Rock.
Before that, she was Anna Devost.
translation.zh: 之前她叫安娜德沃斯特

translation.en: Which is why the surrogate agency missed this.
translation.zh: 所以代孕机构没查到这个 （警方事故报告）

translation.en: But not exactly the picture of innocence.
So I dug a little deeper.
Her parents died when she was 3.
translation.zh: （法庭保护） 三岁时父母双亡

translation.en: She lived with them for 12 years.
Now, this took some work to get to.
translation.zh: 接下来的事费了点劲才查到

translation.en: When she was 16, she attacks her foster dad...
The guy was sexually abusing her.
She's a minor, so the records are sealed.
translation.zh: 她当时未成年 所以档案封存

translation.en: But when she turns 18, she walks out and is gone.
translation.zh: 但满18岁后她就自己离开了

translation.en: You're right where you should be.
And you slowly begin to reawaken yourself...
translation.zh: 你渐渐开始重新唤醒自己

translation.en: You appreciate your mind and your body...
translation.zh: 你感谢自己的心灵和肉体
为在课堂上实现的一切

translation.en: ...and then my mother and then mine.
translation.zh: 先传给我妈 然后传给我

translation.en: I always wanted you to have it.
What are you doing here in my office?
It wasn't the other way around.
You want to be a good man.
But how do you know you love your wife?
translation.zh: 但你怎么知道你爱你妻子？

translation.en: ...what if you found out that this was more real?
translation.zh: 会不会发现这种感觉更真实？

translation.en: -Kiss me. -No, I'm not gonna kiss you.
Or I'll tell her things that will make her leave you.
translation.zh: 不吻我的话 我就告诉她一些会让她离开你的事

translation.en: ...nobody knows what's gonna happen in the future.
translation.zh: 没人知道将来会发生什么

translation.en: I mean, I know what you want.
But you're gonna have to trust me.
I need you to go back to bed.
So will you do that for me?
-You asshole! -Whoa, wait a minute. Hold up!
You lied to me! Stay away from me.
Okay. Give me the knife. Give me the knife.
-Give me the knife. Give me the knife. -I wanna leave!
What the hell is going on?
Every time he screws me, that's what he tells me!
translation.zh: 每次跟我上床时他都这么说

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I hate you!
-What's going on here? -Please don't let him hurt me.
-We got a call, a disturbance. -No. She is having our baby.
translation.zh: -我们接到报警说噪音扰民-没有 她要帮我们生孩子

translation.en: She has to come back inside.
He's been screwing me. Every night.
He told me that he loves me.
Come in the house. Let me talk to you.
translation.zh: 进屋来 让我和你谈

translation.en: -Sir, you need to step back. -Listen, she is carrying our baby.
translation.zh: -先生 请你退后-听着 她怀着我们的孩子

translation.en: Sir, did you hear me? Step back. Now!
translation.zh: 先生 听见了吗？立刻退后
好了 开车注意点 小姐

translation.en: None of what she said was true, okay? None of it. Babe, she is lying!
translation.zh: 她说的没一句是真的 她在撒谎

translation.en: -I never even touched her. -Whatever it was...
And now she's gone with our baby!
translation.zh: 现在她带着我们的孩子跑了

translation.en: Then why didn't you say anything?
I didn't wanna ruin the experience for you.
translation.zh: 我不想毁了这么美好的事

translation.en: I thought that I could handle it, okay? I knew that I was handling it.
translation.zh: 我以为我可以处理我相信我能处理好

translation.en: And then it just.... It just got worse.
translation.zh: 然后 一发不可收拾

translation.en: And then she threatened to take the baby and....
Because I couldn't have a baby...
-...that I can't handle it, you.... -No, I knew you could.
translation.zh: -我无法处理-不 你可以的
-我知道的 只是…-你不知道
-我不想破坏这件事-你骗了我

translation.en: Baby, I just didn't wanna ruin it.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我只是不想破坏这件事

translation.en: I wish I could say that it never happens, but it does.
translation.zh: 我也希望没发生这种事但的确有发生过

translation.en: So when does it become a kidnapping?
Even though it's your egg, fertilized by your husband's sperm...
translation.zh: 即使是你的卵子由你丈夫的精子受孕

translation.en: The law views her as the birth mother.
And when she gives birth, it is her child...
translation.zh: 分娩后 孩子是她的

translation.en: Yes, thank you, I'd like to hold for the doctor.
translation.zh: 行 谢谢 我不挂电话等医生

translation.en: Anna came to the office, caused a lot of problems.
translation.zh: 安娜跑到办公室 惹出一堆麻烦

translation.en: Think Cooper's gonna let me go.
Dr. Park just got a notice from a pharmacy in Mexico...
translation.zh: 帕克医生刚接到墨西哥一家药店的通知
-安娜在那买了塞特泰克-她在墨西哥？

translation.en: -No, she had it shipped here. -What is Cytotec?
translation.zh: -不 她让人把药寄到这-塞特泰克是什么药？

translation.en: Well, it's normally prescribed for ulcers...
...but if a pregnant woman takes enough of it, it could induce labor...
translation.zh: 但孕妇吃了有引产的作用

translation.en: Where is the medicine being shipped?
I got the address. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我手上有地址 走吧

translation.en: No, she's not here. Where are you?
I want you to come back.
Not to her. Just to you.
I can meet you today, right now. Where are you?
translation.zh: 今天就可以见你 现在就可以你在哪？

translation.en: It can't be like it was.
I swear to you, if she does anything to hurt my child, I will kill her.
translation.zh: 我发誓 她要是敢伤到孩子我就杀了她

translation.en: I think if she calls again, you know, I could...
translation.zh: 要是她再来电话 我可以…

translation.en: ...lure her to a public place, have the police there waiting for her.
translation.zh: 把她引到公共场合 让警察等着

translation.en: Except she's not guilty of anything.
She ordered a drug to end the pregnancy.
translation.zh: 她订购了可能会导致流产的药

translation.en: You want me to explain that to a judge?
translation.zh: 你要我这么跟法官解释吗？

translation.en: I mean, you'd win the case, but you'd lose your child.
translation.zh: 你会赢得官司 但会失去孩子

translation.en: She could kill your baby today.
translation.zh: 她今天就能杀了你的孩子

translation.en: You don't have time to bring this to the police.
She was part of the scam and then she fell in love with you. That's what we have.
translation.zh: 她本想诈骗 结果爱上你事情就是这样

translation.en: She could have that baby any minute now. She could be disappearing.
translation.zh: 她随时可能生孩子 也可能消失

translation.en: Oh, that girl ain't going nowhere. She loves you.
translation.zh: 那姑娘哪儿也不会去 她爱你

translation.en: You gotta put her at ease.
-You need to make her happy. -Make her happy?
Making her happy is not an option.
You're wrong. You're wrong. You give her what she wants.
translation.zh: 你错了 你满足她的要求

translation.en: Convince her you're in love with her. Tell her that you're leaving me.
translation.zh: 让她相信你也爱她告诉她你会离开我

translation.en: She is in love with you. If you make her believe...
translation.zh: 她爱着你如果能让她相信…

translation.en: ...that you feel the same way, she will stay with you.
translation.zh: 你也爱她 她会留在你身边

translation.en: She will have the baby for you.
In her mind, I am keeping the two of you apart.
translation.zh: 在她看来 是我害你们不能在一起

translation.en: You convince her that you love her.
translation.zh: 你让她相信你是爱她的

translation.en: When you meet her, you have to make her believe you.
translation.zh: 见到她时 一定要让她相信你

translation.en: That you want to have the baby with her and not with me.
translation.zh: 说你想和她生孩子 而不是我

translation.en: I don't wanna know what you have to do. I don't ever...
translation.zh: 我不想知道你用什么办法我永远…

translation.en: But you do whatever it takes to bring my baby back.
translation.zh: 但你要用一切手段拿回我们的孩子

translation.en: You should take her to the lake house.
translation.zh: 你可以带她去湖滨小屋

translation.en: Tell her that you're thinking of moving there.
translation.zh: 告诉她你打算搬去那里

translation.en: The new exhibit's right that way.
Yeah, it was my father's. Laura hates it.
translation.zh: 是我父亲的 劳拉讨厌这里

translation.en: I guess I should've sold it...
...but part of me always wanted to live here.
translation.zh: 但心里一直想来这里住

translation.en: God, I love it so much, John.
translation.zh: 天啊 我太喜欢了 约翰

translation.en: After I file those divorce papers.
I'm gonna make you so happy, John.
translation.zh: 我一定会让你幸福的 约翰

translation.en: I can't stay long, because I told her that....
translation.zh: 我不能久留 我告诉她…

translation.en: I told her I had to pick up some papers.
translation.zh: 我告诉她我来拿些文件

translation.en: She's gonna stay at the lake house tonight.
She agreed to go to the doctor's with me tomorrow.
translation.zh: 她同意明天和我去看医生

translation.en: I'm okay. I'm going to St. Agnes Hospital.
translation.zh: 没事 我去圣阿格尼斯医院

translation.en: Come as soon as you can.
-I have to go there. -No. No, no.
I know, just trust me. Okay?
translation.zh: 我知道 相信我 好吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm looking for a patient. Anna Walsh.
translation.zh: 打扰了我找一个病人 叫安娜沃什

translation.en: -Are you a relative? Okay. -She's having my son, yes.
translation.zh: -你是家属吗？-她要给我生儿子 对

translation.en: -I got here as soon as I could. -Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: -我以最快速度赶来了-谢谢你

translation.en: No, I'm sorry. I don't have a patient listed under the last name Walsh.
translation.zh: 对不起 这里没有叫沃什的病人

translation.en: Try Taylor. My last name is Taylor.
translation.zh: 试试泰勒 我姓泰勒

translation.en: No, there has to be a Taylor or a Walsh in there.
-No, I have neither. -She's not here, John.
Where the hell could she be?

translation.zh: 郝维辛小姐 你在哪？

translation.en: Are you hiding in the pantry?
What the hell is that smell?
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Hi, this is Laura Taylor. Leave a message--
translation.zh: 你好 我是劳拉泰勒 请留言

translation.en: Please, come now. She's having the baby.
translation.zh: 请快来 她要生孩子了

translation.en: She's dropping. Let's get those fluids going.
translation.zh: 血压下降 继续输液

translation.en: Laura. Laura, can you hear me?
We got a female, early 40s. Possible head trauma.
translation.zh: 女性 四十出头 头部受伤

translation.en: All right, let's cross-type and match.
Doctor says you just have a bad concussion, some stitches...
translation.zh: 医生说是严重脑震荡 需要缝几针

translation.en: I'm across the river at Montgomery Hospital.
translation.zh: 我在河对岸的蒙哥马利医院

translation.en: Anna walked into ER in labor after she attacked Laura.
translation.zh: 安娜袭击劳拉后走进急诊室分娩

translation.en: Gave birth to a healthy baby boy, according to her records.
translation.zh: 生下一名健康男婴 根据记录

translation.en: She left later that evening and took the baby with her.
translation.zh: 她当晚就带着孩子走了

translation.en: I told the police to put an APB...
translation.zh: 我让警方发布全境通缉令

translation.en: ...out on her in every city she's ever lived in...
translation.zh: 在她曾经生活的每个城市

translation.en: ...including that military base in Pensacola where Mike was stationed.
translation.zh: 包括麦克驻扎的军事基地

translation.en: The lake house. It's gotta be the lake house.
translation.zh: 湖滨小屋 肯定是那儿
-别起来 你要做什么？-约翰

translation.en: -Please, I have to go. -I can't let you do that.
John, I am going to get my child back.
translation.zh: 约翰 我要去拿回我的孩子

translation.en: I let you come with me, but this is as far as you go.
translation.zh: 我让你跟我来 但只能到这

translation.en: Look, we know that she's dangerous.
I got you. Just get in the car.
-I got it. -Come on. We gotta move.
I am sick of you, you crazy bitch.
translation.zh: 我受够你了 疯婆子
